abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes arrests in New York after gang members can't resist bragging on Facebook and Twitter, a study about fitness-monitoring apps and weight loss and a talk about Samsung's business strategy.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: TV Hacking and Fitness Apps
